text: Hay bao ho: “Hoi Nguoi dan Kinh Sach! Hay đen cung voi mot Loi phan giong nhau giua chung toi va qui vi rang chung ta chi tho phung rieng Allah thoi, va chung ta khong to hop bat cu ai (cai gi) voi Ngai (Allah), va khong ai giua chung ta se tho cac vi chu te nao khac ngoai Allah ca.” Nhung neu ho quay bo đi thi hay bao ho: “Hay chung thuc rang chung toi la nhung nguoi Muslim (than phuc Allah.)”
